welcome.tryPrompts: Try these prompts to get started

chat.0: Explain quantum computing in simple terms
chat.1: Write a poem about the ocean
chat.2: Help me brainstorm ideas for a birthday party
chat.3: What are the best practices for productivity?

agent.0: Create a Python script to organize my files
agent.1: Analyze this CSV data and create a chart
agent.2: Build a simple web scraper for news articles
agent.3: Help me debug my JavaScript code

research.0: What are the latest developments in AI?
research.2: Explain the history of the internet
research.3: What are the economic trends for 2025?

learning.0: Teach me the basics of machine learning
learning.1: Help me understand calculus step by step
learning.3: Guide me through learning a new language

chat.title: Chat Mode
chat.description: Have natural conversations with AI. Perfect for quick questions, brainstorming, and everyday assistance.

agent.title: Agent Mode
agent.description: AI agent with tool access for complex tasks. Execute code, analyze data, and build applications.

research.title: Research Mode
research.description: Deep web research with source citations. Search, analyze, and synthesize information from the web.

learning.title: Learning Mode
learning.description: Step-by-step guided learning using the Socratic Method. Build understanding through questioning, not direct answers.

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.prompt: Let's have a conversation about something interesting.

codeHelp.title: Code Help
codeHelp.prompt: Help me write a function that...

writing.title: Writing
writing.prompt: Help me write a professional email about...

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.prompt: Analyze this dataset and provide insights...

complexTask.title: Complex Task
complexTask.prompt: Help me solve this complex problem step by step...

marketAnalysis.title: Market Analysis
marketAnalysis.prompt: Analyze the current market trends for...

conceptExplore.title: Explore a Concept
conceptExplore.description: Understand a topic through guided questioning
conceptExplore.prompt: I want to understand the concept of...

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Work through a problem step by step
problemSolving.prompt: Help me understand how to solve...

deepUnderstanding.title: Deep Understanding
deepUnderstanding.prompt: I want to deeply understand why...

skillMastery.title: Skill Mastery
skillMastery.description: Learn a new skill through practice

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Let's get you set up in just a few steps
onboarding.featureChatDesc: Natural conversations with advanced AI models
onboarding.featureAgentDesc: Execute code, analyze data, and automate tasks
onboarding.featureResearchDesc: Deep web research with source citations
onboarding.selectProviderDescription: Select a default AI provider to get started. You can add more providers later.
onboarding.configureApiKeyDescription: Enter your API key to start using this provider.
onboarding.configureOllamaDescription: Configure the Ollama server URL to use local models.
onboarding.ollamaHint: Make sure Ollama is running locally. Download from
onboarding.searchConfigDescription: Enable AI to search the web for up-to-date information.
onboarding.enableWebSearchDesc: Allow AI to search the web during conversations
onboarding.getTavilyKey: Get your free API key from
onboarding.searchOptionalHint: This step is optional. You can configure it later in Settings.
onboarding.mcpConfigDescription: Extend AI capabilities with Model Context Protocol servers.
onboarding.mcpOptionalHint: This step is optional. You can add more servers later in Settings.
onboarding.appearanceDescription: Choose your preferred theme and language.
onboarding.completeDescription: Your configuration is complete. You can always change these settings later.

tour.welcomeDesc: Your AI-powered assistant for chat, code, research, and learning. Let me show you around!
tour.modesDesc: Switch between Chat, Agent, Research, and Learning modes depending on your task.
tour.sidebarDesc: All your conversations are saved here. Search, organize, and pin your favorites.
tour.inputDesc: Type your message, attach files, use voice input, or mention @tools for special actions.
tour.completeDesc: Explore the settings for more customization options. Happy chatting!
tour.settingsWelcomeDesc: Customize Cognia to match your preferences and workflow.
tour.settingsProvidersDesc: Configure your AI providers and API keys. Add OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and more.
tour.settingsAppearanceDesc: Customize the look and feel with themes, colors, and background settings.
tour.settingsMcpDesc: Extend AI capabilities with Model Context Protocol servers for tools and integrations.
tour.settingsSearchDesc: Configure search providers to enable AI web search and research capabilities.
tour.settingsDataDesc: Export, import, and manage your chat history and settings.
tour.projectsWelcomeDesc: Organize your work into projects with custom contexts and knowledge bases.
tour.projectsCreateDesc: Create new projects to organize your conversations and documents by topic or task.
tour.projectsKnowledgeDesc: Add documents, code, and files to build a project-specific knowledge base for AI context.
tour.projectsContextDesc: Set custom instructions and context that apply to all conversations in this project.
tour.designerWelcomeDesc: Build interactive AI-powered applications with a visual designer.
tour.designerTemplatesDesc: Start with pre-built templates for common use cases like chatbots, forms, and dashboards.
tour.designerCanvasDesc: Drag and drop components to build your application interface.
tour.designerPreviewDesc: Preview your app in real-time and deploy it when ready.
tour.academicWelcomeDesc: A specialized environment for research, learning, and academic writing.
tour.academicResearchDesc: Search academic papers, analyze sources, and generate citations automatically.
tour.academicKnowledgeDesc: Visualize connections between concepts and build a structured knowledge base.
tour.academicWritingDesc: Get help with academic writing, including outlines, drafts, and citations.

templates.title: Chat Templates
templates.description: Choose a template to start a new conversation with pre-configured settings
templates.selectToPreview: Select a template to preview its details
